General.Name: Tianjin Jinbin Development
General.Description: Tianjin Jinbin Development Co., Ltd engages in the real estate development business in China. It develops industrial parks, and commercial and mid-to-high-end civil real estate properties. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Tianjin, China.

0.Name: Mr. Zhidan  Yu
0.Title: Exec. Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Non-Independent Director
